attributes.action: Disolve the Government and call a General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I dont think this needs explaination.
We the public are fed up with the expences row and the incompetance of the speaker.
So call aElection if your not affraid Mr Brown

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
